data.title: Court Assistance Office : 5th Judicial District

Court Assistance Hours:

Mon.-Fri 8:00 pm – 5:00 pm (unless traveling districtwide- see dates/times above)

Attorney Workshop:

Every 3rd Tues. of the month at 3:00 pm (after family law workshop), an Attorney is available for general information. No appointment is necessary.

Third Tues. of the month Attorney Workshops will be held on: 2/20, 3/19, 4/16, 5/21, 6/18, 7/16, 8/20, 9/17, 10/15, 11/19, 12/17

2024 – Guardianship Attorney Workshop:

*Feb. 21st (Wed) – by appointment only

*Apr. 17th (Wed) – by appointment only

*Jun. 26th (Mon) – by appointment only

*Aug. 28th (Wed) – by appointment only

*Oct. 30th (Wed) – by appointment only

*Dec. 11th (Wed) – by appointment only

Guardianship Workshop Contacts:

Kasey Kliegl, G&C Monitoring Coordinator, #208-737-6810, kkliegl@tfco.org

Jerry Woolley, CAO, #208-736-4136, jwoolley@tfco.org
